t: This*p is the word of the Lord*s that came to Jeremiah the prophet concerning the Philistines before Pharaoh attacked Gaza:

This*p is what the Lord*s says: “See*pn how the waters are rising in the north; they*ld will become an overflowing torrent. They*ln will overflow the land and everything in it, the*ld towns and those who live in them. The*ln people will cry out; all*ld who dwell in the land will wail
at*ln the sound of the hooves of galloping steeds, at*ld the noise of enemy chariots and*ld the rumble of their wheels. Parents*ln will not turn to help their children; their*ld hands will hang limp.

For*ln the day has come to*ld destroy all the Philistines and*ln to remove all survivors who*ld could help Tyre and Sidon. The*ln Lord*s is about to destroy the Philistines, the*ld remnant from the coasts of Caphtor.
Gaza*ln will shave her head in mourning; Ashkelon*ld will be silenced. You*ln remnant on the plain, how*ld long will you cut yourselves?
“ ‘Alas,*pn sword of the Lord,*s how*ld long till you rest? Return*ln to your sheath; cease*ld and be still.’
But*ln how can it rest when*ld the Lord*s has commanded it, when*ln he has ordered it to*ld attack Ashkelon and the coast?”
